Pantry Details, hours, photos, information: Litchfield Community Church
Provides a food pantry.  The pantry is scheduled to be open on Tuesday. In case of emergency a message can be left on the church phone and someone will reply.One of the ways in which our church supports the community is through our community food pantry. The food pantry provides emergency groceries to families in need, primarily residents of the Litchfield community.The Food Pantry Hours:First and Third Tuesday of the month3:00pm - 5:00pmNon-perishable items may be dropped off in the basket as you enter the church or taken to the church office in Riverside Cottage (across the street from the church) during pastor office hours. We can always use the following items: Spaghetti Sauce Peanut Butter and jelly Cold Cereal Canned vegetables such as peas, corn and carrots Canned meats such as Spam, tuna, and chicken Canned or bottled gravy Macaroni and cheese, as well as Spaghetti-O's and other canned pasta Chicken noodle soup, as well as other canned soupFor more information, please call. 

* Important: Please call the food pantries to confirm that the hours have not changed. We do our best to provide full information and details, but food pantries often change their hours without notifying us. We do not want you to waste your time visiting a pantry that is not open.
